alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 12:12AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jones, southern Lenoir, west central Craven, south central Pitt, northwestern Onslow and northeastern Duplin Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1212 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pleasant Hill, or 16 miles south of Kinston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kinston, Phillips Crossroads, Beulaville, Deep Run, Comfort, Fort Barnwell, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Pleasant Hill, Wyse Fork, Pink Hill, Dover, Cove City, Pollocksville, Hargetts Crossroads and Trenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Pitt
